name: Sally Neptune vs. The Monocronies
description:
Sally Neptune vs The Monocronies

Help Sally Neptune escape from the evil Monocronies!

  • Move: arrow keys
  • Shoot: X (you will lock on to a target that is in front of you)
  • Jump: Z or C

You will need keys to open doors. Look for the giant Neptune coin to escape!

My entry for Toy Box Jam 3! I am super tired, so I will fill this out more later!
